Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The HOMO and the lowest unoccupied molecular orbital ( LUMO ) energy levels of the resulting polymers , PBT and PTT , were substantially stabilized when compared to those of the parent P3HT.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| P3HT |
| PBT |
| PTT |

In the paragraph, the following material names are mentioned:

* P3HT (Poly(3-hexylthiophene))
* PBT (Poly(butadiene-co-3-hexylthiophene))
* PTT (Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene))

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The HOMO and the lowest unoccupied molecular orbital ( LUMO ) energy levels of the resulting polymers , PBT and PTT , were substantially stabilized when compared to those of the parent P3HT.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| HOMO |
| LUMO |
| PBT |
| PTT |
| parent P3HT |

In the paragraph, the following entities are mentioned as property values:

* HOMO (Hydrogen-bonded Organic Molecule Orbital): This refers to the highest occupied molecular orbital energy level of the resulting polymers.
* LUMO (Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital): This refers to the lowest unoccupied molecular orbital energy level of the resulting polymers.
* PBT (Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene)): This is the name of one of the resulting polymers.
* PTT (Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene-co-3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene-co-4,4'-dioxythiophene)): This is the name of another resulting polymer.
* parent P3HT (parent Poly(3-hexylthiophene)): This is the name of the parent polymer used to produce the resulting polymers PBT and PTT.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid entities that refer to "Value of material property" in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| HOMO |
| LUMO |

In the paragraph, the following entities refer to the value of material properties:

* HOMO (Hydrogen-bonded Organic Molecule Orbital): This refers to the highest occupied molecular orbital energy level of the resulting polymers.
* LUMO (Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital): This refers to the lowest unoccupied molecular orbital energy level of the resulting polymers.
